title: 03/04/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 03/04/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, Dan and the guys turn their attention towards some of the quarterbacks who will hear their names called in this year’s NFL draft. NBC Sports’ Chris Simms joined the show to explain his list of top draft eligible QBs, which did not have Trevor Lawrence at the top. In the second hour, impressionist Frank Caliendo zoomed in to explain how he may have had an influence on bringing Watt to Arizona as well as showing off his newer impressions. Lastly, newly minted head coach of the Detroit Lions, Dan Campbell joined in the final hour to talk about his current QB situation, whether he could take Mike Vrabel in an octagon, and what he expects from his team next season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

NBC Sports’ Chris Simms joined the show to explain his list of top draft eligible QBs, which did not have Trevor Lawrence at the top. In the second hour, impressionist Frank Caliendo zoomed in to explain how he may have had an influence on bringing Watt to Arizona as well as showing off his newer impressions. Lastly, newly minted head coach of the Detroit Lions, Dan Campbell joined in the final hour to talk about his current QB situation, whether he could take Mike Vrabel in an octagon, and what he expects from his team next season.
